public static void main(String[] args) {  
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub  
        File file = new File("F:\\Tomcat");  
        list(file);  
        Date myDate = new Date();   
        DateFormat df = DateFormat.getDateInstance();  
        System.out.println(df.format(myDate));   
    }
